Package.swiftã‚’Xcodeã§é–‹ã

Sources/<Packageå>/main.swiftã‚’ç·¨é›†ã™ã‚‹

struct <Packageå>: Website {
    enum SectionID: String, WebsiteSectionID {
        case posts
    }

    struct ItemMetadata: WebsiteItemMetadata {
        // Add any site-specific metadata that you want to use here.
    }

    var url = URL(string: "<ã‚µã‚¤ãƒˆã®URL>")!
    var name = "<ã‚µã‚¤ãƒˆå>"
    var description = "<ã‚µã‚¤ãƒˆè©³ç´°>"
    var language: Language { .japanese }
    var imagePath: Path? { nil }
}

try <Packageå>().publish(using: [
    .addMarkdownFiles(),
    .generateHTML(withTheme: .digitrick),
    .copyResources(),
    .sortItems(by: \.date, order: .descending),
    .generateRSSFeed(including: [.posts]),
    .generateSiteMap(),
])
